mapper.select: SELECT r.id id, r.verb verb, r.uri_pattern uri_pattern, r.name name, r.remark remark FROM t_auth_resource r

SELECT r.id id, r.code code, r.level level, r.name name, r.remark remark, r.status status FROM t_auth_role r INNER JOIN t_auth_role_resource_rel rrr on r.id = rrr.role_id WHERE rrr.resource_id = #{resourceId}
